import React, { useState, useRef } from 'react' import ProfileImage from '../../img/profileImg.jpg' import './PostShare.css' import { UilScenery } from '@iconscout/react-unicons' import { UilPlayCircle } from '@iconscout/react-unicons' import { UilLocationPoint } from '@iconscout/react-unicons' import { UilSchedule } from '@iconscout/react-unicons' const PostShare = () => { const [image, setImage] = useState(null) const imageRef = useRef() return (
Photo
Video
Location
Schedule
) } export default PostShare
